TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DeviceMaximumQueueDepthExceededException extends Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Client.Exceptions.IotHubException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when an attempt to enqueue a message fails because the message queue for the device is already full.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 maximumQueueDepth) cil managed

Docs.param: Maximum number of messages in the queue.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the message string containing the identifier of the already existing device.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

Docs.param: A description of the error. The content of message is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the message string set to the message parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

Docs.param: A description of the error. The content of message is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the message string set to the message parameter and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
